title: How to Draw Hamtaro

steps.headline: Draw a circle in the middle of your page.
steps.description: This circle is going to be Hamtaro's head.

steps.headline: Draw a line in the middle of the circle that will divide it into half these are guidelines.
Draw Hamtaro's cheeks on both sides of the circle.
Draw Hamtaro's ears.
steps.description: Which are similar to Mickey's ears!

steps.headline: Draw Hamtaro's big eyes on the line in the middle of his head like pikachu.
Erase all guide lines and add a big circle, small circle and a tiny circle in his eyes as the details and add two lines on his cheeks as the whiskers.
Colour Hamtaro's eyes black and add some fur on his head and around his ears.
Draw a curved line on Hamtaro's forehead

text: Draw a circle in the middle of your page. This circle is going to be Hamtaro's head. Draw a line in the middle of the circle that will divide it into half these are guidelines.  Draw Hamtaro's cheeks on both sides of the circle.  Draw Hamtaro's body. It's quite chubby! Draw Hamtaro's ears. Which are similar to Mickey's ears! Draw Hamtaro's big eyes on the line in the middle of his head like pikachu.  Erase all guide lines and add a big circle, small circle and a tiny circle in his eyes as the details and add two lines on his cheeks as the whiskers.  Colour Hamtaro's eyes black and add some fur on his head and around his ears.  Draw a curved line on Hamtaro's forehead  Colour him in.
sentences: Draw a circle in the middle of your page.
This circle is going to be Hamtaro's head.
Draw a line in the middle of the circle that will divide it into half these are guidelines.
Draw Hamtaro's cheeks on both sides of the circle.
Which are similar to Mickey's ears!
Draw Hamtaro's big eyes on the line in the middle of his head like pikachu.
Erase all guide lines and add a big circle, small circle and a tiny circle in his eyes as the details and add two lines on his cheeks as the whiskers.
Colour Hamtaro's eyes black and add some fur on his head and around his ears.
Draw a curved line on Hamtaro's forehead  Colour him in.
